title: 89/691/EEC: Council Decision of 21 December 1989 concerning the conclusion of an Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Republic of Iceland on trade electronic data interchange systems
header:
30.12.1989 EN Official Journal of the European Communities L 400/11
COUNCIL DECISION
of 21 December 1989
concerning the conclusion of an Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Republic of Iceland on trade electronic data interchange systems
(89/691/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Republic of Iceland on trade electronic data interchange systems is hereby approved on behalf of the Community.
The text of the Agreement is attached to this Decision.
The President of the Council shall give, on behalf of the Community, the notification provided for in Article 8 of the Agreement.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 December 1989.
For the Council
The President
E. CRESSON
(1)  OJ No C 285, 11.11. 1989, p. 6.
(2)  Opinion delivered on 15 December 1989 (not yet published in the Official Journal).
(3)  Opinion delivered on 19 December 1989 (not yet published in the Official Journal).
(4)  OJ No L 285, 8. 10. 1987, p. 35.
(5)  OJ No L 97, 11. 4. 1989, p. 46.
